scripts.clean:screenshots: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const screenshotsDir = path.join(__dirname, 'screenshots'); if (fs.existsSync(screenshotsDir)) { fs.rmSync(screenshotsDir, { recursive: true, force: true }); console.log('Screenshots directory cleaned'); } else { console.log('Screenshots directory does not exist'); }"
scripts.test: npm run clean:screenshots && jlpm playwright test sage_diff_interactions
scripts.test:update: npm run clean:screenshots && jlpm playwright test --update-snapshots
scripts.test:llm: npm run clean:screenshots && jlpm playwright test sage_llm_test --headed
scripts.test:diffs: npm run clean:screenshots && jlpm playwright test sage_diff_interactions
scripts.test:headed: npm run clean:screenshots && jlpm playwright test --headed
scripts.test:debug: npm run clean:screenshots && jlpm playwright test --debug
